questions.question: What is the Temporal Dead Zone (TDZ)?

questions.subject: javascript

options: Creating unique, immutable primitive values often used as object property keys

options: An object that wraps another object and intercepts/redefines fundamental operations

options: A mutex that allows only one thread to execute Python bytecode at a time

options: A function/class that modifies the behavior of another function or class using @syntax

options: Restricts instance attributes to declared names, saving memory by avoiding __dict__
